hero.description: State-of-the-art diagnostic imaging with cutting-edge technology. Your health deserves the highest level of accuracy and care.

services.title: Comprehensive Diagnostic Solutions
services.description: Advanced imaging services powered by state-of-the-art technology and expert professionals

xray.title: Digital X-Ray
xray.description: High-quality digital X-Ray imaging for precise diagnosis of bones, chest, and other conditions with minimal radiation exposure.

ct.title: CT Scan
ct.description: Advanced multi-slice CT scanning for detailed cross-sectional imaging with fast scan times and superior image quality.

mri.title: MRI
mri.description: High-field MRI for exceptional soft tissue and neurological imaging with patient comfort features.

ultrasound.title: Ultrasound
ultrasound.description: Safe and effective ultrasound imaging for obstetrics, abdomen, and various diagnostic needs.

ecg.title: ECG
ecg.description: Comprehensive electrocardiography services for accurate heart health assessment and monitoring.

pathology.title: Pathology Lab
pathology.description: Complete pathology and laboratory testing services with quick turnaround and accurate results.

about.title: Trusted Healthcare Partner Since 2009
about.description1: Manmohan Imaging Center has been at the forefront of diagnostic imaging services for over 15 years. We combine cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to provide accurate and timely diagnoses.
about.description2: Our team of experienced radiologists and technicians work together to ensure every patient receives personalized attention and the highest quality service.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Manmohan Imaging Center?
whyChoose.description: We are committed to excellence in diagnostic imaging and patient care

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Book your appointment or reach out with any questions. We're here to help!
